# Ek Bata Shoonya (एक बटा शून्य)

> A free educational platform for learning mathematics in Hindi — from zero to infinity.

## About

Ek Bata Shoonya is a YouTube-first educational project that teaches the foundations of mathematics in Hindi. The name means "one divided by zero" (1/0), symbolising the journey from basic concepts to the infinite depths of mathematical thinking.

The platform is designed for students, teachers, and mathematics enthusiasts who want rigorous mathematical education in Hindi. Content is available in four language modes:

- **Pure Hindi (शुद्ध हिन्दी)**: Complete Devanagari script with Sanskrit-derived terminology
- **Mixed Hindi-English (मिश्रित)**: Hindi with English technical terms in Devanagari
- **Hinglish**: Roman script transliteration for those comfortable with Latin characters
- **English**: Full English for international accessibility

## Courses

### Mathematical Logic
Study of fundamental principles of logic. Topics include basic concepts, logical connectives, truth tables, and formal proofs.

- Lecture 0 — Basic Concepts (available in Hindi, Mixed, Hinglish)
- Lecture 1 — Logical Connectives (coming soon)

## Key Features

- Free, open-access mathematics education in Hindi
- Video lectures on YouTube with companion written notes
- Structured courses starting from foundational logic
- LaTeX-rendered mathematical notation
- PDF notes and cheatsheets
- Privacy-friendly (no cookies, no tracking)

## Target Audience

- Hindi-speaking students preparing for competitive exams (UPSC, GATE, NET, etc.)
- Undergraduate mathematics students wanting conceptual clarity
- Teachers looking for Hindi-language mathematics resources
- Self-learners and mathematics enthusiasts
- Anyone interested in logic, set theory, and mathematical foundations
